personality.traits: I am utterly serene, even in the face of disaster. I connect everything that happens to me to a grand, cosmic plan.
personality.ideals: Free Thinking. Inquiry and curiosity are the pillars of progress.
personality.bonds: I entered seclusion because I discovered something that could change the world - and I won't let it fall into the wrong hands.
personality.flaws: I am dogmatic in my thoughts and philosophy, often to the detriment of others.

character_appearance_description: Kazrek is a stout mountain dwarf with a thick iron-gray beard braided with small copper rings. His hands bear the calluses of a smith, though they now crackle with arcane energy. His deep amber eyes seem to glow faintly when he casts spells, a sign of the wild magic that awakened within him during his years of solitary study in the mountains.
backstory:
Kazrek spent decades as a master smith in the Ironpeak Mountains, renowned for his ability to forge weapons of exceptional quality. But something changed when he discovered an ancient vein of crystal deep in an abandoned mine - crystals that hummed with magical energy.

The crystals awakened something dormant within him. Wild magic began to manifest unbidden, causing his forge fires to burn in strange colors and his hammered steel to sing. Frightened by these powers he couldn't control, Kazrek retreated into hermitage, spending years studying the crystals and learning to channel the sorcerous power that now flowed through him.

Now he emerges from seclusion, his smith's pragmatism tempered by arcane knowledge, seeking to understand the true nature of his gift and the mysterious crystals that awakened it.

allies_organizations.name: The Crystalforge Discovery
allies_organizations.description: Kazrek guards the location of the crystal vein that awakened his powers. He believes these crystals could revolutionize both smithing and magic - or cause tremendous destruction in the wrong hands. His hermitage served both as a place of study and as a guardian post.

spells.name: Burning Hands
spells.description: 3d6 fire damage (Dex save for half). +1d6 per slot level above 1st.

spells.name: Magic Missile
spells.description: Three darts, 1d4+1 force each. Auto-hit. +1 dart per slot level above 1st.

spells.name: Shield
spells.description: +5 AC until start of next turn, including against triggering attack. Immune to magic missile.

features.name: Dwarven Resilience
features.description: Advantage on saving throws against poison, and resistance to poison damage.

features.name: Stonecunning
features.description: Double proficiency bonus on Intelligence (History) checks related to the origin of stonework.

features.name: Font of Magic
features.description: You have 2 sorcery points. You can convert spell slots to sorcery points (slot level = points) or sorcery points to spell slots (2 points = 1st level slot).
